Zack Frazier

Experienced front‑end fixer. Fun guy.

Passionate Chicago-based front-end developer and keen UX leader with nearly 20 years of success optimizing user experiences for brands such as GE, P&G, Harley-Davidson, Sittercity, CME Group, Discover, Orbitz, and United Airlines.

Experience

  • Front-end coding, application architecture
  • Agile sprint planning, MVP requirements, feature definitions
  • Client relations, project planning, budgeting
  • Interactive prototyping, Lean UX, A/B testing
  • Team leadership, mentoring, resourcing
  • Design direction, collaborative product design

Skills

  • HTML5, SVG, accessibility, ARIA
  • Node.js, Gulp, Bower, Ruby, Rails, JSP
  • JavaScript, JSON, React, Angular, jQuery
  • CSS3, responsive, transitions, animations
  • Routing, APIs, REST, Parse
  • Sketch 3, Photoshop, OmniGraffle, InVision
